extendedInfo.description: One Touch, your theater manner is completed.#. How to useFollowing functions are operated with one touch.1.Switching into Vibration mode.2.The brightness becomes the lowest level.3.Automatic restoration into the original state after 3 hours* Bug / Q&A-Email: appstore@broadcon.co.kr-Homepage: www.broadcon.net-Twitter: @broadcon-Facebook: www.facebook.com/broadconhc
